attributes.action: Change the law / sentencing against people who use dogs for fighting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who is caught using dogs to fight only recieve 6 months sentencing. Please sign this petition to stop this kind of suffering to dogs and other animals. If these people were treated in the same way they treat their dogs, something would be done instantly, so why should it be any different ?  they ought to know better. Please sign this and lets get this lame sentencing increased to STOP this sort of cruelty NOW

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
